content: The following steps might be helpful: "Settings" > "General settings" > "Display" > "Account list" section > untick "Show Unified Inbox" > close Thunderbird > open Thunderbird again.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: Hi Yu5tiqX9og, tacehd.Thank you for that. Unfortunately, it isn't bringing up my Gmail Account Inbox/Other Folder/Options. Please see the image attached.
creator: connman

content: The following steps might be helpful: "Manage folders" (which appears in the image you uploaded) > Tap the folder you want to configure > Enable "Show folder" > If necessary, close Thunderbird for Android, and then open Thunderbird for Android again.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
